- AnalyzerInput

Structure

# AnalyzerInput

Time-coded audio data.

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
struct AnalyzerInput
```

## [Overview](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput\#overview)

The audio data must have an `AVAudioFormat` that is supported by the analyzer’s modules; the analyzer does not perform audio conversion. Call [`bestAvailableAudioFormat(compatibleWith:considering:)`](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/speechanalyzer/bestavailableaudioformat(compatiblewith:considering:)) (or its variants) to select an appropriate format to convert to.

The audio format may differ from one `AnalyzerInput` object to the next. The modules will be reconfigured if necessary (and possible) as needed.

## [Topics](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput\#topics)

### [Creating an input element](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput\#Creating-an-input-element)

[`init(buffer: AVAudioPCMBuffer)`](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput/init(buffer:))

Creates an audio input object.

[`init(buffer: AVAudioPCMBuffer, bufferStartTime: CMTime?)`](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput/init(buffer:bufferstarttime:))

Creates an audio input object for audio that may be discontiguous with previous input.

### [Inspecting an input element](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput\#Inspecting-an-input-element)

[`let buffer: AVAudioPCMBuffer`](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput/buffer)

The audio buffer containing this input.

[`let bufferStartTime: CMTime?`](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput/bufferstarttime)

The time-code of this input.

## [Relationships](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput\#relationships)

### [Conforms To](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput\#conforms-to)

- [`Sendable`](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Swift/Sendable)
- [`SendableMetatype`](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Swift/SendableMetatype)

## [See Also](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput\#see-also)

### [Input and output](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/analyzerinput\#Input-and-output)

[`protocol SpeechModuleResult`](https://developer.apple.com/documentation/speech/speechmoduleresult)

Protocol that all module results conform to.

Current page is AnalyzerInput
